item.description:
Whether we use Reiki or any other type of healing modality, it is important to understand that the present condition of our DNA requires clearing before cosmic energetic changes anchor on planet in 2012.

To understand why, click on the link below and view all three video presentations.

http://www.krystalspi...

Safe and Effective Keylontic Science Technologies are available for this purpose.

Numerous FREE techniques can be viewed at www.AzuritePress.com.

There is also an e-group you can join by clicking on a link at that site.

Individual appointments to facilitate this process can be scheduled via www.ulcsclinic.com, but you can learn to do this yourself!

But since space is limited at our FREE monthly Meetups, it would be best to RSVP here early to reserve a seat. You can also reserve extra seats for guests, but please change your RSVP if you or your guests can't make it.

Topics of each monthly Meetup pertain to different aspects of the process of DNA template regeneration. Additonal details about the topic for each month are usually posted as soon as the previous month's Meetup is over.

By using the Keylontic Science technologies included in the Kathara(TM) Bio-Spiritual Healing System, we can heal energetically, mentally, physically, emotionally and spiritually!

With your full original organic DNA template regenerated, you will become all that you were created to be!

These MCEO translations are still on-going, and essential for self-preservation because our current planetary energetic crisis is known to be getting worse.

Because of irreversable energetic changes occuring in 2012,

TIME IS OF THE ESSENCE!

Until further notice, we will be joining with another group which has been studying advanced levels of energy healing, which includes regeneration of our original organic template.

Please bring your own refreshments, and enter through the front door with the Meetup sign.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up first driveway (Meetup sigh) and enter through front door. No need to knock, just go on downstairs and have a seat in the waiting room.

group.name: Indigo Insights: Awakening to our Full Potential

item.name: DNA Template Regeneration (Up to 48 Strands)
